meta.max_stay: Up to 9 months (usually 3 months per visit)
meta.photo_spec: Digital, 4:3 aspect ratio, 900x1200px to 2250x3000px, light background

documents.title: Passport Bio Pages
documents.description: Scanned copies of all pages with visa stamps/entries.

documents.title: Digital Photo
documents.description: High-quality digital photo meeting NZ specific dimensions.

documents.title: Proof of Funds
documents.description: 6 months bank statements, Pay slips (3 months), ITR-V (3 years). Must show ~1000 NZD/month.

documents.title: Employment Proof
documents.description: NOC from employer, Letter of Leave, or Business Registration.

documents.title: Cover Letter
documents.description: Detailed itinerary, purpose of visit, and ties to home country (India).

documents.title: Return Ticket
documents.description: Proof of onward travel or funds to buy a ticket.

steps_flow.title: RealMe Account
steps_flow.description: Create a RealMe account on the Immigration New Zealand website.

steps_flow.title: Apply Online
steps_flow.description: Complete the Visitor Visa application form online.

steps_flow.title: Upload Docs
steps_flow.description: Upload all documents as PDFs and the photo as JPG.

steps_flow.title: Pay Fees
steps_flow.description: Pay the Visa fee and IVL using a credit card (approx. 341 NZD).
